titleInfo.title: Sociology in Germany: development, institutionalization, theoretical disputes; on occasion of the XIIIth World Congress of Sociology

bibliographicCitation.chicago: Kaufmann, Franz-Xaver. 1994. “Sociology in Bielefeld”.
